title: The Art Of Destiny Volume 3 Releases This April, Preorder At Amazon
description: The Art of Destiny Volume 3 $50 | Releases April 15 Preorder at Amazon Preorder at Target Preorder for Kindle Destiny fans will soon have a new art book to add to their collection, as The Art of Destiny Volume 3 is slated to release on April 15. The long-awaited third entry in the popular series was originally scheduled to hit stores on November 19, but it was delayed by several months. Volume 2 released way back in 2017, so nearly eight years have passed since Insight Editions' last collection of art and commentary. As such, Volume 3 has a lot of ground to cover, and it will begin right where Volume 2 ended. This means fans who own all three volumes will have cohesive collection of artwork chronicling the development of Destiny 2 over the past decade.You can preorder The Art of Destiny Volume 3 for $50 at Amazon. Additionally, you can pick up the first two books at a discount.Continue Reading at GameSpot
excerpt: The long-awaited third entry in The Art of Destiny series will be published April 15, over seven years after the last book.

html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Destiny fans will soon have a new art book to add to their collection, as The Art of Destiny Volume 3 is slated to release on April 15. The long-awaited third entry in the popular series was originally scheduled to hit stores on November 19, but it was delayed by several months. Volume 2 released way back in 2017, so nearly eight years have passed since Insight Editions' last collection of art and commentary. As such, Volume 3 has a lot of ground to cover, and it will begin right where Volume 2 ended. This means fans who own all three volumes will have cohesive collection of artwork chronicling the development of Destiny 2 over the past decade.

You can preorder The Art of Destiny Volume 3 for $50 at Amazon. Additionally, you can pick up the first two books at a discount.

The Art of Destiny Series

  • The Art of Destiny Volume 1 (2014) --$38.26 ($50)
  • The Art of Destiny Volume 2 (2017) -- $29.69 ($50)
  • The Art of Destiny Volume 3 (2025) -- $50 | Releases April 15

The Art of Destiny Volume 3

$50 | Releases April 15

Initially, store listings stated The Art of Destiny Volume 3 would contain 216 pages, but it will actually have 272 pages. It includes a ton of exclusive concept art, character sketches, landscape paintings, gear designs, and more. The illustrations are accompanied by commentary, and there are even interviews with members of the development team.

As mentioned, The Art of Destiny Volume 3 was originally slated to release in November, but a lengthy delay pushed it to April 15. The Art of Destiny Volume 3

You won't be charged for your order until it ships, and you'll automatically pay the lowest price offered until release. At the moment, The Art of Destiny Volume 3 is full price for the hardcover edition. Alternatively, you can preorder the Kindle ebook edition for $18.

Fans should also check out the six-volume Destiny Grimoire Anthology series, which offers an in-depth look at the lore of Bungie's sci-fi world. And if you're looking for more stories in the Destiny universe, you can grab a hardcover collection of Destiny comics for $14 (was $20).

Destiny Art Books

  • Destiny: The Exotics Collection Volume 1 -- $21 ($35)
  • The Art of Destiny Volume 1 --$38.26 ($50)
  • The Art of Destiny Volume 2 -- $29.69 ($50)
  • The Art of Destiny Volume 3 -- $50 | Releases April 15

Destiny Grimoire Anthology

  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume I -- $18.24 ($25)
  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume II: Fallen Kingdoms -- $18.86 ($25)
  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume III: War Machines -- $16 ($25)
  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume IV: The Royal Will -- $17.79 ($25)
  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume V: Legions Adrift -- $15.39 ($25)
  • Destiny Grimoire Anthology, Volume VI: Partners in Light -- $15.60 ($25)
  • Destiny Comic Collection, Volume 1 -- $13.82 ($20)
